import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL='http://localhost:8080';// Adjust to your backend URL
export const getDailySummaries=city=>axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/dailySummary/").concat(city));export const setThresholds=thresholds=>axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/alertThresholds"),thresholds);export const getAlertThresholds=()=>axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/alertThresholds"));// Removed the getTriggeredAlerts function
